title: Ep. 61 - It's Time To Buy Natural Gas Stocks
itunes:title: It's Time To Buy Natural Gas Stocks
description: Matt Badiali, editor of the S&A Resource Report, says natural gas stocks could make a big run in 2011. Frank breaks down the oil services sector, Alcoa earnings, and suggests why VZ and AT&T are both losers on the iPhone deal.
content:encoded: Matt Badiali, editor of the S&A Resource Report, says natural gas stocks could make a big run in 2011. Frank breaks down the oil services sector, Alcoa earnings, and suggests why VZ and AT&T are both losers on the iPhone deal.
